org.jdesktop.binding.swingx.adapter
Class RowSetAdapter

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      org.jdesktop.binding.swingx.adapter.RowSetAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
public class RowSetAdapter
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel

Placeholder for future RowSet TableModel adapter to enable easy connectivity to JDBC RowSet functionality. For more details see the JSR 114. Note: This class is not yet fully functional.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Amy Fowler
